message: I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product for a price of $15,000. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll find valuable.
I appreciate your offer, but $15,000 is a bit higher than I'm willing to pay.  I'm interested in this product, but I'm only able to offer $9,000 at this time.  Let me know what you think.

I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $12,500. This is a fair price considering the value this product brings to the table.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $12,500 is still a bit high for me.  How about we split the difference and settle on $11,000?  This would be a fair price for both of us, and it would allow me to move forward with the purchase.
